section.name: Questions
section.p: A good way to prepare to create a scrape is to ensure you have answers to the following questions.

ol.li: What is the entry point for the scraped data (usually a URL)?
How many pages need to be scraped?
How does the user get to thoe pages?
At what times in the day should the pages be scraped; which days?
Any login/passwords needed to get to the scraped pages?
Any business constraints? ie) trying to get the scraped data out in very aggressive timely manner
How often is the data posted?
Is the scraper expected to get historical data to fill in missing gaps of data due to downtime?
It cna be very useful to ask your domain expert for a print up of the pages in question, with the desired data highlighted.
